person.name: Anna Allen
person.bio: Anna has developed “Solutions of Harmony for the Highest Good” by applying her natural gifts, formal education, professional acumen, and miraculous experiences for almost three decades. As a Social Scientist, she is Globally known as a renowned Advisor, Author, & Alchemist to leaders, entrepreneurs, and influencers alike.
person.excerpt: A Social Scientist, she is Globally known as a renowned Advisor, Author, & Alchemist.
